< p > U.S. President Donald Trump , in a complete reversal , said on Friday he [V: would] hold a summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un on June 12 in Singapore in the latest twist in the high - stakes diplomacy over eliminating Pyonyang 's nuclear arms program.</p >

< p > U.S. President Donald Trump , in a complete reversal , said on Friday [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: hold] [ARG1: a summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-TMP: on June 12] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] [ARGM-LOC: in the latest twist in the high - stakes diplomacy over eliminating Pyonyang 's nuclear arms] program.</p >

< p > U.S. President Donald Trump , in a complete reversal , said on Friday he would hold a summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un on June 12 in Singapore in the latest twist in the high - stakes diplomacy over [V: eliminating] [ARG1: Pyonyang 's nuclear arms] program.</p >
